name: Dollar Tree, Inc.
description: Dollar Tree, Inc. is a leading discount variety store chain that operates thousands of locations across the United States and Canada. Founded in 1986, Dollar Tree specializes in providing a wide assortment of merchandise, all priced at $1.25 or less. The company offers a diverse range of products, including household goods, food and snacks, seasonal items, party supplies, and health and beauty aids. Dollar Tree caters to value-conscious consumers seeking to maximize their purchasing power while maintaining a broad selection of quality products. The company has experienced significant growth over the years, both organically and through strategic acquisitions, including the purchase of Family Dollar in 2015. This acquisition has allowed Dollar Tree to expand its footprint and reach a wider customer base. With a strong emphasis on community involvement and customer satisfaction, Dollar Tree continues to innovate its merchandise offerings and improve the shopping experience. The company's mission is to provide customers with value and convenience, making it a go-to destination for everyday essentials. Additionally, Dollar Tree is committed to sustainability initiatives, focusing on reducing waste and improving energy efficiency in its stores and operations.

seo.meta_title: Dollar Tree, Inc. | Your One-Stop Value Shop
seo.meta_description: Explore Dollar Tree, Inc., the leading discount variety store chain offering a wide range of products at unbeatable prices. Discover our commitment to value and community.

faq.question: What products does Dollar Tree offer?
faq.answer: Dollar Tree offers a wide range of products including household items, food and snacks, seasonal items, and party supplies, all priced at $1.25 or less.

faq.question: Where is Dollar Tree headquartered?
faq.answer: Dollar Tree is headquartered in Chesapeake, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Dollar Tree?
faq.answer: Michael Witynski is the CEO of Dollar Tree, Inc.

faq.question: Does Dollar Tree have an online store?
faq.answer: Yes, Dollar Tree has an online store at dollartree.com where customers can shop for a variety of items.
